welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Matawan, a charming city known for its rich history and beautiful surroundings. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Linden Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Linden Airport is reserved for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The oldest and smallest terminal at Newark Liberty International Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: The largest and busiest terminal at Newark Liberty International Airport, serving mainly domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: The newest and most modern terminal at Newark Liberty International Airport, serving mainly international flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require a login and have limited speeds.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Monmouth Executive Airport offers a variety of amenities and services for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Monmouth Executive Airport caters to the needs of private and corporate aircraft owners and passengers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This terminal serves international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic flights for Delta Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: This terminal serves international flights for Delta Airlines and its partners.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for JetBlue Airways.

terminals.name: Terminal 7
terminals.description: This terminal serves international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 8
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for American Airlines.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Caldwell Wright Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Caldwell Wright Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for free.
